Series Code: Present value of external debt (current US$) (DT.DOD.PVLX.CD)
Description: Present value calculations for these countries are for public and publicly guaranteed debt only.

Series Code: Present value of external debt (% of exports of goods, services and income) (DT.DOD.PVLX.EX.ZS)
Description: Present value calculations for these countries are for public and publicly guaranteed debt only.

Series Code: Present value of external debt (% of GNI) (DT.DOD.PVLX.GN.ZS)
Description: Present value calculations for these countries are for public and publicly guaranteed debt only.
